item.description:
So a while back I bought a DVD "How to ride like a pro" and have have watched part of it, but I thought.. "Hey why not get all the Scooter people together and have a party.. a birthday party... my birthday! it's actually on the 16th and I'll be celebrating my 44th year on this planet.

So this will be dinner and a movie, a party and a meet & greet all in one at my house in Newton. Actually my mom's house and you can meet her, the one responsible for me being able to write this in the first place. :)

Plenty of Scooter parking available!

More details to come

Hope you can make it!

Paul

P.S. Your presence are all the presents I need, hope to meet some new Scooter Fanatics and eat cake with my new Scooter buds.
item.how_to_find_us: It's my house, so it should not be too hard
item.name: Movie Night & BDay Party
